LanguageData.MParmor_WreckageFall.label: Mechframe wreckage crash
LanguageData.MParmor_WreckageFall.letterText: A mechframe's wreckage is crashing near the colony! Power cores may be salvaged from it to make your own mechframes.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_GiveQuest_SleepingMechanoids.l: A mechframe power core is being defended by mechanoids. The cores can be retrieved if the mechanoid threat is dealt with.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_RaidEnemy_AntiMPArmor.label: Raid: Anti-MF
